name: FootnotePrefixSuffix
shortdesc: Footnote prefix or suffix placement options.

property.name: NO_PREFIX_SUFFIX
property.shortdesc: Does not use a prefix or suffix.

property.name: PREFIX_SUFFIX_REFERENCE
property.shortdesc: Places the prefix and/or suffix on the footnote reference number in the main text.

property.name: PREFIX_SUFFIX_MARKER
property.shortdesc: Places the prefix and/or suffix on the footnote marker number in the footnote text.

property.name: PREFIX_SUFFIX_BOTH
property.shortdesc: Places the prefix and/or suffix on both the the footnote reference number in the main text and the footnote marker number in the footnote text.
